title: Create GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
description: Setup GitHub Actions workflows for: 1) CI - run tests, linting, type checking on PRs/pushes, 2) CD - build and publish to PyPI on releases, 3) Test matrix for Python 3.10, 3.13 across OS (Linux, macOS, Windows).

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline:

**CI Workflow (ci.yml):**
- Triggers: push/PR to main branch
- Test matrix:
  - OS: Ubuntu, macOS, Windows
  - Python: 3.10, 3.11, 3.12, 3.13
- Steps:
  - Install Poetry and dependencies
  - Cache venv for faster builds
  - Run pytest with coverage
  - Upload coverage to Codecov (Ubuntu + Python 3.11)
- Lint job:
  - Ruff linting and format checking
  - Mypy type checking

**CD Workflow (publish.yml):**
- Trigger: GitHub release published
- Environment: pypi with URL
- Permissions: id-token write (for trusted publishing)
- Steps:
  - Install Poetry
  - Build package (sdist + wheel)
  - Publish to PyPI using trusted publishing

Ready for automated testing and publishing on release.
